name: 0100-Lodge House
short_description:
Lodge House #100 brings a rustic mountain family cabin to life with some modern touches and furnishings, and is located within our Shore Acres Lodge meaning you are setup in an amazing location on the shores of the lake! This cabin is equipped with all that you will need for your vacation, including a comfy living room with leather furnishings, a mounted flat screen TV/DVD player above the toasty wood burning fireplace, and French doors that lead out to a private patio deck area with a charcoal BBQ and outdoor seating available for your use. The kitchen has all you need for a family meal, including cooking utensils, basic appliances including a dishwasher,  plus a nice dining table for your meals. Off of the kitchen area and connecting the back patio deck is a full laundry room for your needs. Lodge House has a fabulous central location close to the downtown Village and hiking area, plus entertainment and fun on-site, making this the perfect place to spend any mountain vacation here in Big Bear!

Seasonal Pool & Spa, Beach Area, Boat Docks, Picnic Areas and FREE WiFi.

short_description:
Lake Shore is a family and pet friendly lakeside home sitting on a private corner fenced lot on the shores of Big Bear Lake, and next door to our Shore Acres Lodge for added amenities and convenience, yet still within a short walk to the Village. Enter into the cozy dining room area complete with tables for meals and a toasty wood burning fireplace. To the left are the two main house bedrooms, and on to the right is your kitchen and living room areas, complete with lake views. The kitchen has your cooking essentials and appliances, including cookware, and the comfy living room offers an additional wood burning fireplace and access to the massive deck overlooking Big Bear Lake. The downstairs separate apartment / game room is accessed by heading from the upper deck downstairs to a SEPARATE entrance, and offers a pool table, bathroom, and additional sleeping quarters, plus there is a private outdoor spa on the patio below the deck. The yard is spacious and provides a wonderful mountain atmosphere for the whole family to enjoy year round, making this a wonderful destination for your next mountain vacation!

name: 1085-Alpine Lodge
short_description:
Alpine Lodge is a charming lake-view home sitting just above the Big Bear Village and lake, featuring the essentials for a perfect mountain vacation in the trees, including a private hot tub and separate guest room with pool table above the garage, this gem has knotty pine wood charm throughout, high vaulted pine ceilings, and custom mountain decor. The chef of your group will love the equipped open floor-plan kitchen and dining room area, complete with cooking essentials and appliances including a dishwasher to whip up your home-cooked meals, plus a large log dining table and counter bar seating is available for meals and entertaining. There are comfortable furnishings and awesome mountain views available in the cozy living room while you warm up around the toasty river rock wood burning fireplace, or venturing outside to the redwood deck you will find a private outdoor spa, patio seating, and a propane BBQ for your use. By stepping OUT of the main house, down the stairs, and through the 2 car garage, you will gain access to the SEPARATE game room and 4th bedroom. This private escape within this alpine lodge house boasts a full size 8ft pool table plus additional rock fireplace, a TV/DVD player, Queen sofa sleeper bed and a half bath (sink and commode only). name: 1211-Bear Heaven
short_description:
Bear Heaven #1211 is a family (and dog) friendly single story cabin sitting on a spacious private corner lot.  This fully furnished and centrally located cabin is within a short walk to Big Bear Lake and Meadow Park, and only a mile and a half from Snow Summit Resort. There is a spacious kitchen equipped with all the essential cookware and place settings, a dishwasher, plus a nice dining table for six that can be expanded for up to eight people. The living room offers comfy furnishings and a toasty wood burning fireplace. The new 50 inch Smart TV has full cable plus movie channels; Netflix, Amazon, Hulu and more streaming apps, a soundbar for theater sound, and a Blue Ray player- great for a family movie night at the cabin. There is a cozy game nook perfect for playing one of the many games, coloring or reading as the shelf across from the game nook has games, books (for all ages), coloring supplies and DVD movies for your enjoyment. There is deck access out to the fully fenced back yard area with a nice treed lot, private outdoor hot tub, charcoal BBQ and picnic area to fully enjoy this alpine environment. This home is centrally located within a few minutes drive to the downtown Village, grocery store, or ski resorts, making Bear Heaven the perfect cabin for a getaway to the mountains any time of year!

The entry room kitchen is very spacious and equipped with cooking essentials, appliances and a dishwasher, while there is a huge formal dining room and table with seating for 8 people available. This property hosts a wonderful lakeside bay location in a serene mountain setting, yet boasts a deck overlooking the water, nice outdoor patio furnishings, a natural gas BBQ and a relaxing and private outdoor spa. This mountain retreat is complete with a freshly remodeled kitchen including stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher, a full laundry room, and a wonderful dining area with table seating for six people. The comfortable and cozy living room area offers nice leather furnishings, a new flat screen HDTV/DVD, and a toasty wood burning fireplace for those chilly mountain evenings. There is also a fun packed media room off of the living room that boasts a 2nd wood burning fireplace, nice sitting area, a new flat screen TV/DVD, games and more gorgeous lake views.  This lakeside retreat has a relaxing and serene location, yet is just a few minutes by car to the ski resorts, grocery stores, and downtown entertainment, making this the perfect location for your Big Bear vacation!

Moonridge Serenity #1392 is a wonderful and unique two level mountain chalet which is nestled in the mountains, with an awesome ski slope view, yet is only minutes by car to the downtown area for entertainment. The equipped kitchen offers cookware and utensils, appliances including a dishwasher, and a nice dining area with table seating for meals. There is a warm and cozy living room with soaring picture windows, and is nicely furnished with mountain decor, including a toasty wood burning fireplace, and a flat screen TV/DVD. The fantastic back deck is accessed from the living room and has wonderful treed views and a charcoal BBQ, while the lower level of the home has a full bath and stacked laundry for your use.

name: 1409-Boulder Creek
short_description:
Boulder Creek #1409 is a basic upper level condo with the essentials for a great vacation, including a master suite with private balcony and bathroom, peek-a-boo lake-views from the rear balcony, forced central heat, and a full kitchen. The living room has a TV/DVD and a cozy wood burning fireplace, and leads to the guest bedroom and full hallway bathroom. The equipped kitchen has general appliances including a dishwasher, cookware and essentials for meals, plus a cute dining area that opens out to a balcony with a great view of the Boulder Bay Park. Just a minutes drive to down town Big Bear, and a short walk to the lake for fishing and boating activities, this Boulder Creek condo is the perfect place to spend your stay here in the mountains!

name: 1411- Inn Between Pines
short_description:
Inn Between Pines #1411 is a centrally located two story log-style cabin that provides all that you need for a wonderful mountain vacation. Entering the cabin you are immediately greeted with fresh hardwood floors, comfy custom furnishings, and a warm at-home living room with seating couches, a cute dining table, toasty fireplace, and a mounted flat screen TV for your enjoyment. The adorable kitchen has what you need for a home-cooked meal, including appliances and cookware, a dishwasher, and even counter bar seating. This home has no shortage on entertainment, providing an awesome lower level game room with pool table, Foosball and darts, plus a private in-deck hot tub and charcoal BBQ. This cabin has it all, nestled "Inn Between Pines" in a relaxing neighborhood yet just minutes to all local activities, you are sure to experience the BEST of Big Bear when staying in this vacation retreat.

NOTE: This home does not allow any alternative heating sources such as space heaters.

name: 1421-Abe's Amazing Cabin
short_description:
Abe's Amazing Cabin is a fun and entertaining family retreat, complete with an outdoor in-deck private spa in the fenced rear yard and a most supreme location just a block from the lake and a short walk to the downtown Village for shopping or dining. Entering into the cute and cozy living room you are greeted with a true mountain feel, hardwood floors, high vaulted ceilings, and a floor-to ceiling toasty rock fireplace and a custom log dining table for your group. The nicely appointed kitchen has all that your chef will need to whip up your home-cooked meals, while off this area is the step-down fun-packed game room. Enjoy your time making memories around an additional wood burning fireplace on the comfortable seating couches, or take up a game of pool table, board games, or a movie on the state of the art entertainment center with Smart TV which allows you to connect to cable, premium pay channels, Netflix, Hulu, Facebook and Youtube. Abe's is the place to be for your next vacation to the mountains, providing ample space for the whole group, necessities from home, added premium amenities, and a superb downtown location, you will love it here season to season for years to come!

name: 1441-Narrow Escape
short_description:
Narrow Escape is a beautiful furnished two story mountain cabin, furnished in fresh mountain decor and equipped with all that you need for a memorable alpine vacation, all while located within a short walk to the lake, marina, or downtown Big Bear Village for shopping and dining. Entering into a relaxed lake-view living room you will find comfortable log furnishings, a toasty wood burning fireplace, and a new flat screen TV/DVD player for your enjoyment. The open floor plan leads to the dining table for six and fully equipped kitchen, offering additional breakfast nook seating, cookware and general appliances including a dishwasher for the chef of your group to whip up your home-cooked meals. From this kitchen area you will find a separate game room with additional fireplace, flat screen TV, and a full size pool table, plus a shared hallway bathroom and indoor hot tub room are also available for your enjoyment. The property offers expansive lake-view decking on a massive lot, great outdoor patio furnishings and a natural gas BBQ area, and peek-a- boo mountain and lake views. Pairing the comforts of home with custom mountain decor and wonderful amenities, Narrow Escape is packed and ready with your vacation stay in mind to provide a most memorable Big Bear Vacation.

Featuring large open floor to ceiling windows to enjoy the alpine scenery and a toasty wood burning fireplace, the comfortable living room offers nice seating couches and a flat screen TV/DVD player for your enjoyment. Also on this lower level is a well equipped kitchen with basic appliances, cookware, and bar seating, plus a dining room table for your meals. The lower level has a front patio that offers a propane BBQ and a nice back yard, while the upstairs loft has a private balcony with lake-views and small 1/2 bath available. This home is in a fabulous location, within a mile walk to the downtown Village area for shopping, dining, and entertainment, and only a few minutes drive to the ski resorts and grocery stores.

name: 1494-Living Log Cabin
short_description:
Get ready to relax and unwind while you are "Living Log Cabin" in this irresistible mountain log gem, located on a secluded Bear City property, yet is still within a few minutes drive to all that Big Bear has to offer. The warm and crisp entry level living room has comfy leather couches for making memories around the toasty wood burning fireplace, a mounted flat screen TV/DVD player for your enjoyment, stair access to the upper level, plus the open floor plan leads right into the kitchen/dining area with additional front deck access to enjoy the propane BBQ and outdoor patio furnishings. The chef of your group will love the freshly equipped and furnished kitchen with custom knotty pine cabinets, granite counters, cookware and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher to whip up your home-cooked meals, plus there is a complete log dining table for four and additional breakfast bar seating for meals. This fabulous and secluded home is on a large fenced 3 lot parcel property with a freshly installed patio area and new hot tub for you to take in this true mountain experience, offering privacy and plenty of space among the trees. Book your stay today so your group can enjoy the experience of a lifetime "Living Log Cabin" here in beautiful Big Bear!

Entering on the ground level in the living room area you are greeted with comfy couches and modern electronics, plus a fully equipped kitchen and dining area for meals. There are french doors off of this area that lead out to the serene and private raised deck with beautiful patio furnishings and a propane BBQ among the tree tops available for your use. The entire upper level of this home boasts the massive master suite featuring a huge over-sized full master bath and a gorgeous soaking tub complete with treed views for your soak. How Sweet It Is truly is a sweet cabin, providing extreme relaxation and tranquility, yet is still within a short walk to the lake or downtown area for entertainment, making this the perfect destination for your next Big Bear vacation!

name: 1541-Bear Lodge
short_description:
Bear Lodge is a tri-level Fawnskin home, located on a hill with a view of the lake, packed full of entertainment and spacious enough for the entire family to enjoy the perfect Big Bear Vacation! The second floor includes the comfortable and “woodsy” living room with wood burning fireplace, flat screen HDTV/Stereo, and fully stocked kitchen with stainless steel appliances, plus a large walnut dining table with a fold-out card table top, an enclosed sunroom porch with lake-view, casual bar and dart board, plus an expansive deck with patio furniture and propane BBQ. The first floor is nearly a “separate home” with the log-lined game room, with its Warrior foosball table and  a 7 ft. Viper Arctic ice/air hockey table and 55” HDTV, plus plenty of sleeping quarters, providing entertainment for the kids and a separate space for movies and video/table games, a shared hallway bath and laundry room. The top third floor features the two large master bedrooms, one with its own wood burning fireplace for quiet getaway time, plus a shared hallway bath on this level. Located within a ten minute drive to downtown Big Bear grocery stores, ski resorts, shopping and dining, plus awesome snow play hills on site.

You will love the comfort and location of this bright and refreshing condo that over looks the Boulder Bay Park and has peek a boo views of the bay from the dining area and the private rear patio. Entering the condo you are immediately greeted with hardwood floors heading right into a nicely decorated master suite with an unbelievably comfortable Queen bed, private full bathroom and added private front balcony overlooking the nicely manicured common courtyard of the complex. Down the hall you will find a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for the chef of your group to whip up your home-cooked meals, and complete with cookware, appliances, and even a dishwasher for your convenience. The comfortable and modernly furnished bay-view living room area offers a toasty wood burning fireplace, large mounted flat screen TV, and access to the private bay-view balcony with Boulder Bay Park next door where you can fish, kayak, or enjoy many lake activities. The gorgeous log table for four provides a great place to reminisce over dinner while the additional guest bedroom offers a Full bed. Located just minutes from the Village or resorts this wonderful condo pairs sophistication with the necessities from home, making this the perfect destination for your next trip to Big Bear.

Come "Retreat to Fox Farm" and enjoy a serene and relaxing alpine getaway in this gorgeous log-style chalet home, centrally located just minutes to town yet set back on a quiet cul-de-sac street which is the perfect setting for couples, groups, or a family. Furnished and equipped with your vacation stay in mind, this single level mountain home has all that you need for a fantastic alpine adventure including a foosball table for your enjoyment right as you enter into the warm and cozy cabin-themed living room area. The open floor plan leads you right into the equipped kitchen and dining area offering a custom log dining table, general appliances, and cookware to whip up your home-cooked meals. This single story chalet is spacious and easily accessible, featuring two full bathrooms and three great sized bedrooms, plus a beautiful back deck with an awesome BBQ area and outdoor patio furnishings. Located less than two miles to the Bear Mountain Ski Resort, Golf and Zoo this prime location keeps you within minutes by car to any local activity in Big Bear. Pairing comfort, mountain charm and a most serene location Retreat To Fox Farm has all that you need to make a most memorable time out of your next vacation!

name: 1671 - Sweethearts Sanctuary
short_description:
It doesn't get any sweeter than Sweethearts Sanctuary when you are looking for nature's paradise and extreme serenity here in Big Bear for your next vacation. Perfect for any season, the neighborhood consists of pine-tree lined streets and this cabin provides flat and ample parking. Entering your cabin you will be surrounded by crisp and bright tall windows overlooking the massive private yard, where you can enjoy your sanctuary in the trees with a private outdoor hot tub and peek-a-book views of the lake, there is never a shortage on romance here. Feel the warmth of the fireplace as you cozy up in the new comfy furnishings and unwind while enjoying the Streaming TV with Roku system and expanded movie options or crank up the Bose sound system to your favorite tunes. There is a completely equipped kitchen area offering cooking essentials and appliances, plus you can sit at the dining table and enjoy peek-a-boo lake views through the trees of the lake. Relax on the back deck with patio table and chairs plus a charcoal grill available for your use over looking the spacious and secluded back yard, or you will find a hammock for two tucked among the many trees on the property. Sweethearts Sanctuary is perfect for any season, with an incredible location, you will feel away from it all, yet you are still located within a short picturesque walk to the lake and still have direct access to everything that Big Bear has to offer! We love our cabin, and we hope that you will enjoy making your memories here!

name: 1681 - Stormy Bear
short_description:
Stormy Bear #1681 is a beautifully remodeled upscale mountain chalet that is completely upgraded with everything that you and your family will need all year round. Located between both Snow Summit and Bear Mountain Resorts and within a block's walk to the shuttle pick up, you won't need to fight or pay for parking while on your way to the slopes for a day on the snow. The entry level living room offers comfortable couches and unique mountain furnishings, while there is a toasty gas burning fireplace, surround sound stereo system, and a large SmartTV with BluRay/DVD player available for your enjoyment. The open floor plan leads from the living room area into the nice dining room that offers a formal log table with seating for large family meals for eight people. Entering the spacious kitchen you will find all that you need for cooking a gourmet meal, including a Thermador professional range, stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher, additional breakfast bar seating, and even a full size wine cooler for your adult beverages and entertaining. The huge kitchen is open to a great entertainment area with a custom full size pool table, bar seating and tables, backyard and deck access, plus a massive flat screen TV for your enjoyment. Continuing outdoors you will find a spacious fenced back yard that includes a half size basketball court, a big entertaining redwood deck with Propane BBQ, patio furnishings and a private hot tub available for your use.

name: 1691 - Swiss Delight
short_description:
Swiss Delight is a beautiful Big Bear mountain home, equipped and stocked with your vacation experience in mind, and is perfect retreat location for all occasions and seasons. Located in a well treed and peaceful neighborhood, walking distance to beautiful hiking trails and half way between the two ski resorts and the downtown Village, you are under ten minutes by car to all that Big Bear offers. Entering this great home you will find the spacious living room, offering an open floor-plan into the kitchen and dining areas and boasting custom furnishings, a flat screen TV with streaming services, toasty fireplace, and wonderful mountain charm. The chef of your group will fall in love with the spacious and well equipped kitchen, complete with cookware and essentials to whip up your home-cooked meals, while there is seating for eight provided around the custom log dining table. This multi-level home boasts 4 bedrooms, with enough sleeping for up to 11 people, and with it's sprawling layout affords the perfect amount of privacy and space for larger groups or families to still experience the mountains together. This middle level of the home boasts two of the bedrooms, while there is a lower level bedroom available and the massive upstairs "bunk room" has multiple beds along with a shared hallway bathroom and a cozy game room area with foosball table.  Venturing outside the cabin enjoy the large and fenced back yard, complete with a nice deck and brand new hot tub plus a charcoal BBQ is available for your use. Swiss Delight is truly a delightful home, pairing ultra relaxation in this central alpine environment with the comforts of home and mountain chalet motif your group will be ready to return year after year to this amazing escape!

name: 1750 - Heavenly Log Home
short_description:
Heavenly Log Home is a luxurious new build that is sure to impress. Located in the upscale forested area between Snow Summit and Bear Mountain, this home is the one you will be returning to for all seasons. Enter into the great room, with vaulted ceilings, spacious floor plan, and amazing windows that allow in an incredible amount of natural light, you will instantly understand why this place is heavenly. The living room has comfortable furnishings, wet bar, pool table, wood burning fireplace, and 65” flat screen TV with cable. The extra large kitchen is perfect for all preparing meals together with brand new stainless steel appliances. Next to the kitchen is a cozy little alcove, with barrel chairs, and guitars for your use. Out to the back deck, which was recently doubled in size, you will find the Jacuzzi, and propane BBQ. A great space for entertaining or relaxing and enjoying the beauty of the forest behind the house. The first 3 bedrooms are located on the first floor, while the kids room, with foosball table, is located upstairs. This layout will ensure your family quality time together, or peace and quiet to enjoy separate activities.
Amazon’s Alexa is conveniently placed throughout the home for your needs. Ask her about nearby restaurants, things to do, and weather. This one of a kind home was designed with you in mind. Proximity to Club View Drive means easy access and mere minutes by car to the excitement of The Village, the lake, and all that Big Bear has to offer.
Upon arrival at the cabin, you'll be greeted by a large wood deck, a double sliding glass door entrance and level two car drive-up parking. 
Towering twin pines arise from our front deck giving our guests a unique "cabin in the woods" feel, as though the cabin were nestled in the heart of the forest. 
Just inside the entrance you'll see some of the unique features of the cabin:
Immediately to the right, and original to the cabin, are built-in storage racks for skis, a built-in wood bench for taking ski boots on and off and a grate to place them after a day in the snow. The dining area features a solid-wood built-in dining table with bench seating that comfortably seats 5. The kitchen breakfast counter features a 4" thick slab of lacquered pine wood that seats an additional 3. Swiveling rocker recliners in the living room and a comfortable sofa create a great place for the family to gather and relax in front of a roaring fireplace. A well-equipped kitchen comes with the essentials you'll need to make a hearty home-cooked meal. The loft features a full array of entertainment for your family to enjoy. It features a Wii gaming system with a selection of video games, several board games, cards and puzzles to wile away the hours.
Snuggle down in the evenings with some popcorn and watch streaming movies on either Netflix or Hulu or make a quick run to the nearby Redbox and rent a movie to play in our DVD.
Not in the mood for a board game or movie? Sit out on the deck with one of our down lap blankets, listen to the coyotes howl and watch for shooting stars.
Your stay at Twin Pines cabin will bring you a relaxing escape from the daily grind and memories that will stay with you for a lifetime!

The open floor plan leads you into the dining area and kitchen, with the essentials provided for the chef of your group to whip up your home-cooked meals. The back deck offers outdoor seating, a propane BBQ, and a private hot tub all within a flat and fenced alpine environment. The upstairs loft is also a game room offering futons for sleeping plus a regulation size pool table and great ambiance for your mountain memories together. name: 1815 - Cute and Cozy
short_description:
This cozy cottage is a great getaway for couples or small families.  Located in Sugarloaf, you are walking distance to hiking trails, in a great spot for quiet mornings enjoying your coffee and watching for wildlife, and only 10-15 minutes away from the lake and village. You can have the best of Big Bear in this tiny retreat. Enter into the living room with flat screen TV with cable, and a wood burning fireplace. The small dining and kitchen are both located in the entry as well, with a fully equipped kitchen for preparing meals. Since this is a single story, you will find both bedrooms, and both bathrooms easily accessible. Out through the master bedrooms, which also has it's own fireplace, you will find the back deck. Beat the heat in the summer, cuddle up in the winter, and enjoy the fresh mountain air year round.

Sleeping Arrangements:
Bedroom 1: Full Bed
Bedroom 2: Queen Bed
Living Room: Sleeper Sofa

Parking:
2 Vehicles

name: 1816 - Evergreen Haven
short_description:
This amazing retreat is going to be your new home away from home after you stay. Located walking distance to Snow Summit, you get to ski without worrying about parking or shuttles, mountain bike from your front door in the summer, and you are approximately one mile from the village and the lake access. Whether you're in town for a special occasion, local event, outdoor activities, holidays, or just to get away from it all, this cabin really is a haven. Enter into the cozy mud room, where you can shed jackets, boots, or any other gear you've brought. Immediately to your right is the laundry room with washer and dryer, and half bath. The open living room, dining, and kitchen are so warm and inviting, you're going to feel right at home the second you walk in the door. With vaulted ceilings and windows, this isn't your typical gambrel. It let's in a lot of natural light, while still giving you privacy. The living room has  wood burning fireplace, and access out to the patio where you will find the steamy Jacuzzi, and charcoal BBQ. The kitchen is fully equipped for preparing meals, and has beautiful stainless steel appliances. On this bottom level you will also find two bedrooms and a full shared hall bath. Upstairs is a loft with foosball and an extra futon for sleeping. Down the hall is the master bedroom and shared hall bathroom. Come enjoy Evergreen Haven!

Bedroom 1: Queen, Downstairs
Bedroom 2: Twin/Full Bunk Bed, Downstairs
Bedroom 3: Queen, Upstairs
Loft: Full Futon

Parking: 3 Vehicles

name: 1818 - Golden Bear Lodge
short_description:
Your getaway in the Golden Bear Lodge is going to be unforgettable. Located walking distance to the ski slopes, and approximately one mile to the village and marinas, you have the best of Big Bear activities right at your fingertips. But that's if you can bring yourself to leave the comfort of this phenomenal cabin. Enter into the game/den area, with a beautiful pool table, flat screen TV, and hard wood floors throughout. Further into the home you will find the spacious and fully equipped kitchen, and dining area. Perfect for cooking meals together, or gathering around once it's all complete. The living room has cozy furnishings, wood burning fireplace, and flat screen TV with streaming capabilities, with Hulu Live provided. Since this is a single story home, all bedrooms are easily accessible. They are also equipped with flat screen TVs with Hulu Live, quality furnishings, and will make you want to book your next stay before you even leave. Onto the back patio, you will find the hot tub and propane BBQ. Golden Bear Lodge has it all. Bring friends, bring family, even bring your pets. Golden Bear Lodge will provide the perfect space for making memories.

name: 1819 - Eagle Mountain
short_description:
Enjoy the beauty of whispering forest at this beautiful cabin located on the north shore, you get the best of both worlds. Quick access to all of the great activities, such as off road vehicle trails, hiking trails, Oktoberfest, access to the lake via marinas, and Big Bear Village. You have full access to the entire downstairs level of this home, however, you will not share the property or premises at all, making this home a single story and gives easy access to each of the three bedrooms and bathroom. Enter into the bright living room with comfy furniture, flat screen TV, gas fireplace, and basic kitchenette with cooking capabilities. (No Oven)  The property is fenced and great for outdoor snow play for kids. Eagle Mountain is going to be your go to for getaways once you stay and experience the comfort of this home.

name: 223-Bear Lake
short_description:
Bear Lake #223 is a lakeside single story family home which boasts a wonderful deck overlooking the shores of Big Bear Lake, and offers a private outdoor spa, charcoal BBQ, and awesome lake access for water activities. The practical kitchen has basic cookware, utensils, and appliances including dishwasher plus breakfast bar seating, while the lake-view dining room offers table seating plus a cute breakfast nook with bench seating. There is also a warm and cozy living room area that features comfy furnishings, mountain decor, a toasty wood burning fireplace, and a huge flat screen TV/DVD player for your entertainment. Bear Lake cabin offers extreme serenity and relaxation, located on a great fishing point, and next to Lagunita Lodge, yet is still only a few minutes by car to local attractions and entertainment, making this the perfect home for your next mountain getaway to Big Bear!

name: 234-Vista Pines
short_description:
Vista Pines #234 is a rustic 1940's single story mountain cabin which is fully furnished and features both a toasty living room area and an additional sitting room, and is located in a wonderfully treed and quiet neighborhood, just a short walk to the downtown Village for shopping, dining or entertainment. There is a practical kitchen that includes basic essentials for cooking, general appliances with a dishwasher,plus a small dining area with table seating for meals. The entry living room area has mountain decor and furnishings, comfy couches and a TV/DVD player, plus a toasty fireplace. On the other end of the dining room there is an additional sitting room with more couches available, a shared hallway bath, washer and dryer, and access out to the amazing back yard and deck. Vista Pines is an original rustic mountain home within a great location, and provides the essentials one would need for a nice Big Bear getaway, making this property a great choice for your stay.

There is a basic yet equipped kitchen providing you with the essentials you will need for meals, including basic appliances and a dishwasher, plus there is a cute dining table with a nice treed view for meals. name: 314-Eagles Nest
short_description:
Eagles Nest #314 is an incredible and unique tri-level lakeside estate that sits back on a beautiful and spacious treed lot in the prime "Eagle Point" neighborhood of Big Bear. Enter into the warm and cozy sunken living room area which offers a toasty rock wall fireplace, comfy furnishings, plus amazing lake-views from the colossal windows. Stepping up into the gourmet kitchen you will find newly remodeled appliances and a dishwasher, plus a huge formal dining table and kitchen bar seating for meals. The garage-converted game room offers a ping pong table for your group, plus a laundry area and two of the garages are still available for parking. There is also a downstairs game room that offers even more entertainment with access to a full size pool table, additional couch seating, a mini wet bar and game table, plus access to the lower expansive redwood deck and private outdoor spa with lake views. This estate has the most amazing Master Suite with lake views and a private master bathroom with jetted tub is available. Eagles Nest is located in a superb mountain setting, with a large and spacious lakefront lot, yet is just a couple of miles from the downtown Village shopping area, making this estate the prime location to spend your next getaway to Big Bear.

name: 380-A Main Escape
short_description:
The perfect getaway for a small family or group of friends, A Main Escape is a great cabin, centrally located within a mile walk to the lake or downtown Village area, this retreat is furnished with mountain decor and the needed essentials for a tranquil mountain vacation in Big Bear. Entering into the comfortable living room you are greeted with a true mountain cabin feel, offering a toasty wood burning fireplace and knotty pine floors, high beamed ceilings, comfortable furnishings and flat screen TV with DirecTv Premier Package (offering HBO, Showtime, Cinemax, Stars)  for your enjoyment. The open floor plan leads right into the kitchen area, complete with basic appliances and cooking essentials to prepare your home-cooked meals, plus a cute dining table with seating for six is available. There is a lower level bedroom and bath available while the cool upstairs loft boasts two additional beds and a shared half bath plus there is a stacked washer and dryer for your use. Offering both a front and rear deck to take in this mountain environment, you will find a charcoal BBQ and outdoor patio furniture ready for you. Whether you are heading up for a ski-cation during our winter months, or a fun filled day at the lake during the summer time, A Main Escape is the perfect destination to escape reality and really enjoy all that Big Bear has to offer.

name: 537-Nine Pines Lodge
short_description:
Nine Pines Lodge #537 is a newly renovated two story log cabin with a fabulous treed property, surrounded by 9 large pine trees, yet is still in a central location which keeps you within just a few minutes drive to the local zoo, grocery stores, lake, or even the downtown area for shopping and entertainment. Entering into the super comfortable living room area, you are immediately greeted with log decor and mountain furnishings, while the room is dominated by a floor to ceiling stone gas fireplace, (this is the only heat source for the home) with a gorgeous log mantle featuring a large mounted flat screen TV/DVD player for your enjoyment. Leading from the living room into the dining room and kitchen area, you will be met with a log table and chairs for meals, while the equipped kitchen has basic appliances, cookware and utensils for your stay, plus there is deck access to the treed mountain views and charcoal BBQ available outside. This fantastic home offers two bedrooms on each level, plus two full bathrooms, one of which includes a beautiful jetted spa tub, plus for your convenience there is a stacked washer and dryer and Free WiFi Internet available during your stay. Nine Pines Lodge offers extreme relaxation and serenity surrounded by trees, boasting the best in amenities and decor, plus is equipped with essentials and then some, all while being located in a wonderful "close to it all" neighborhood, this mountain vacation home is the best destination choice for your next retreat to Big Bear!!

Oriole Cottage #621 is a nicely decorated, fully furnished and adorable single story cabin located within a short walk to the shores of Big Bear Lake, and a few minutes drive to all local activities within the valley. Entering this home, you are greeted with a warm and cozy living room that includes big open windows, comfy couches and sitting chairs, a toasty fireplace and a flat screen TV/DVD player for your enjoyment. The practical kitchen has the essentials needed for meals including cookware and utensils, basic appliances with a dishwasher, plus there is kitchen bar stool seating and a cute log dining table which offers seating for four. There is a foosball table and TV/DVD player available in the 2nd bedroom for your entertainment, while a shared hallway bath, washer and dryer, and fenced yard with Charcoal BBQ are available for your convenience. Oriole Cottage is a wonderful family mountain home within a great location, providing all that you need for a memorable mountain trip!

name: 639-Bear Mountain Chalet
short_description:
Bear Mountain Chalet #639 is a spacious three story family cabin that provides a prime location anytime of the year, along with the essentials and entertainment, this home has what you need for the perfect vacation! Entering this massive property on the first level, you are met with a packed game room that features skee/foos ball tables, and a private indoor hot tub for your use. Venturing to the second level of this home you will find two of the sleeping quarters, a separate laundry area and a shared hallway bathroom.The third level of this property features an equipped and modern kitchen with cookware and utensils provided, a cozy and warm living room with fireplace and TV/DVD player, a cute dining room area with table seating for meals, plus there is a nice balcony off of the living room that offers awesome mountain and ski slope views. Bear Mountain Chalet has it all, while being fully equipped and furnished, spacious enough for the entire group, packed full of entertainment and amenities for your convenience, plus the very best location just minutes to all that Big Bear has to offer!

name: 664-Storybook Lakefront
short_description:
Storybook Lakefront #664 is a spacious two story home on the shore of Big Bear Lake, featuring all that you need for an adventurous mountain vacation including a fully furnished home, expansive decking, a relaxing outdoor spa and propane BBQ, plus is within a picturesque walk to the downtown Village area. Equipped with a big open kitchen full of essentials and cookware and a dishwasher, you will also find an attached breakfast nook and a large dining table area with gorgeous lake views is available for your meals during your stay. Entering the very nicely decorated living room you are greeted with massive floor to ceiling windows to take in this amazing lakeside location. The comfortable furnishings and high end decor give a relaxing feel, while the foosball table, wet bar, and a flat screen TV/DVD player are available for your enjoyment. The lower level of this property hosts one of the bedrooms and a common full bathroom with plug-in Bluetooth Speakers, while the upper second level adorns a fabulous lake view loft, shared hallway bath, and the other 3 sleeping quarters, including the massive Master Suite with private bath. Stepping outside you will find expansive outdoor decking and BBQ areas with plenty of outdoor room for entertaining or lake activities, along with the outdoor spa, and shore access. Storybook Lakefront is the perfect home for a vacation to the mountains, offering all that you need to make memories here in Big Bear!

name: 686-Bear Stone
short_description:
Bear Stone is a nicely furnished and unique two story retreat located in a nice quiet neighborhood within minutes to the ski resorts, grocery stores, and all that Big Bear has to offer. Entering the cabin, there is a fun family room with regulation size pool table on one side, and a comfy living room area with wonderful furnishings, a gas only fireplace, and a TV/DVD player on the other side. The kitchen is fully equipped with appliances and a dishwasher, cookware and utensils, plus there is a formal dining room with table for seating and meals. The gorgeous Master Suite offers a private master bath with a jetted spa tub for your enjoyment. The lower level also offers access to the fenced backyard with the nice big redwood deck, a play set for the kids, and a Charcoal BBQ is available for your use. Bear Stone is a charming property combining new and updated furnishings with entertaining amenities and essentials, all while being in a great central location, making this the perfect vacation destination to spend your next mountain getaway!

name: 735-Bear Creek Lodge
short_description:
Bear Creek Lodge is a custom two story retreat set back in a great location with views of Bear Mountain ski resort from the expansive redwood decking. Enter in from the door on the lower level of this home, with a cozy gas fireplace and Full size Sleeper Sofa, mounted flat screen TV, game table, plus a unique one-of-a-kind game room offering a knotty pine built-in bar to entertain your group and a regulation size pool table. If you can tear yourself away from the lower entry level of this property, you will venture upstairs to find that nothing to please was left out in this custom mountain chalet. The beautiful living room features hardwood floors, comfortable leather couches, additional flat screen TV, and a toasty faux gas log fireplace. The open floor plan offers direct access to the fully equipped kitchen which includes filtered hot and cold water, cookware and utensils, appliances including a dishwasher, and granite counters with additional bar seating. The main upper level has deck access out to this amazing alpine environment where you can take in the slope views while you grill up some dinner on the Charcoal BBQ, or after a day at the slopes, venture out back to soak worries away in the private outdoor hot tub. Bear Creek Lodge is located in the Moonridge area, less than a five minute drive down to the grocery store, ski resort, or the downtown Village area, and has all that you need for any trip to the mountains, making this location the perfect escape for your next vacation to Big Bear.

name: 800 - Lakefront Spectacular
short_description:
This Amazing Lakefront Property has Lake & Bay Views from Every Room! Located in quiet Boulder Bay, you are not far from Ski Resorts, Dining & the Village. Winter entry (middle floor) has a Mudroom Foyer that also boasts two bedrooms as well as a shared hallway bath featuring a Jetted Spa Tub with Travertine. Entering into the upper level you are immediately greeted with Lake and Mountain Views with Natural Light. The open Family Room has a Large Rock Fireplace, Wet Bar, Wine Fridge, Vaulted Ceiling and Travertine 1/2 bath. The Gourmet Kitchen offers all that the Chef of your group will need to whip up your home-cooked meals including Granite Counter Tops, Convection Oven and Stainless Appliances. The large dining table offers Views of Big Bear Lake and Boulder Bay with access to the wrap around Deck to enjoy your morning cup of coffee. Enjoy Privacy Behind Large Boulder & Cozy Cabin Feel. The lower level of this Magnificent Property is where you gain access to the back door; Lawn, Spa, Lake and Private Boat Dock which is Perfect for Fishing. The Master Suite has a Slate Shower and Pebble Floor that feels like a Foot Massage and the attached 4th bedroom has Log Bunk and Futon. Home has a Tankless Water Heater & Smart TV’s. Make your next getaway here in the Mountains Unforgettable with Lakefront Spectacular!

name: 845-Summit Paradise
short_description:
Summit Paradise sits on a flat corner lot just at the base of Snow Summit Resort, the perfect location for skiing in the winter (no parking needed as you can walk from the cabin) or a quick five minute drive to the Big Bear Village. The newly renovated and equipped kitchen offers fresh appliances and cookware for you to whip up your home-cooked meals, and a nice dining table with seating for six. Around the corner, the spacious open living room has comfy seating couches and chairs plus a massive rock wood burning fireplace and mounted flat screen LED HGTV plus a shared hallway bathroom is available on this lower level. Heading upstairs you will find all three sleeping quarters, the first "bunk" room is perfect for the kids, while the open loft leads into the amazing master retreat. This master suite offers a second upper level living room area with wood burning fireplace, private kitchenette with wet bar, foosball and private full bathroom. Both the upper deck and lower level patio offer great ski slope views of Snow Summit Resort as well as outdoor patio seating and a Charcoal BBQ for your use. Equipped with all that you need and recently renovated with your vacation stay in mind, don't pass up your chance to live the splendor life here at Summit Paradise!

Angel View Chalet is a fabulous luxury mountain retreat in a secluded location with awesome tree top and ski slope views. This exquisite estate boasts a gourmet kitchen with granite counters, upgraded and new appliances including a dishwasher, and a beautiful formal dining room with an extensive table with seating for meals for ten people. The living room area is warm and welcoming, with a massive flat screen TV/DVD player, leather furnishings, and a poker game table available for your enjoyment. The amazing upper level has tree top decks off of the Master Suite, which also offers a massive Master bath with a jetted tub for your use. Also upstairs you will find a huge fun-packed game room boasting additional couch seating and TV/DVD player, hardwood pine floors, plus a foosball and pool table for your entertainment. This stunning property also offers a separate laundry room for your stay, and expansive outdoor decking which includes a private hot tub and fully fenced yard. Angel View Chalet has it all, providing custom furnishings and decor, plus entertainment and wonderful amenities, this property will have you hooked on returning again and again to make your memories here in Big Bear a reality.

short_description:
Seven Star Sunrise Retreat #900 is a luxurious custom mountain home which overlooks Metcalf Bay and is the perfect mountain setting for large family gatherings, birthday celebrations, holiday entertaining, or groups of any kind. Entering this exquisite property on the middle level, you are greeted with beautiful hardwood floors, high vaulted open-beamed ceilings, and high end furnishings and decor. The lovely deck located on this main level provides stunning views, a very relaxing atmosphere, and is spacious so the entire family can enjoy the outdoors while barbecuing. Boasting a gourmet kitchen including high end appliances and a dishwasher, double oven for large meals, and granite counters plus bar seating, plus a huge formal dining room with table seating for meals. The lower suite has additional sleeping quarters, a large entertainment center with a full game room and kitchenette, an inside/outside fireplace enjoyable from the game room or the lovely attached patio, plus an indoor spa and steam shower are also available. Seven Star Sunrise Retreat is an extraordinary home, offering the absolute best of Big Bear, for those that wish to indulge in elegance, or those who choose to just unwind, have a family get together, or enjoy the quiet solitude of the mountains, this retreat is sure to satisfy all your needs.
